txt.en: Gurthagar can be found in the eastern Fields of Fornost, near Amon Amrûn.\n\nYou should defeat Gurthagar, for this being has sapped the life from the Fields of Fornost.
'Ahhh... a life, whole and hale. Let me devour you. I will drain all that you have, all that you are.'
Gurthagar can be found in the eastern Fields of Fornost, near Amon Amrûn.\n\nYou should defeat Gurthagar, for this being has sapped the life from the Fields of Fornost.
You have defeated Gurthagar, one of the chief forces of evil in the Fields of Fornost.
You have defeated one of the chief forces of evil in the Fields of Fornost.
You have encounted Gurthagar, a terrifying presence in the Fields of Fornost....

A great shuddering dread chills you to your bones.\n\nYou have encounted Gurthagar, a terrifying presence in the Fields of Fornost. This ghostly being is strong from having pulled the life from the lands around it.
